resources:
EarthquakeApp Earthquakes Emergency Settings
//information fragment strings What To Do During an Earthquake? Correct actions to take during an earthquake are critical to your safety. Here are some important tips. If you are indoors 1. Stay calm and do not panic. 2. Drop, Cover, and Hold On: Get under a sturdy piece of furniture and hold on. 3. Stay away from windows, mirrors, and exterior walls. 4. Move to a safe spot next to a sturdy furniture or an interior wall.
